title: Oro
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and restaurant in St. Johanner Market with courtyard and space for up to 150 diners. Huge cocktail selection. Menu is in German. Vegetarian and vegan options are labelled separately (the side-dishes not). Vegan suitable include a few starters and salads, carrot ginger soup, veggie satee indochine. Ask for the vegan balsamic and olive oil dressing. Note that pasta contains egg.
